text_block_list.text:
One weekend, on my way out, I 
passed by the Academy gate…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
D-D-D-Don't do something so soft 
in the middle of town, you idiot!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
D-Dammit… If we don't hurry, we're 
gonna run out of photo books!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you! Don't you know how to 
avoid the guys on the main street?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
A side road…! Oh, right! I forgot 
there was another way!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's a bit of a mess, but it can't 
be helped! Hurry up and go around!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
…Just so you know, I'm not scared 
of you or anything! Don't get the 
wrong idea!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Sprinting at full speed……! 
You want me to run through 
before I see you!?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
No, I can do it! I can do it! I 
can run faster than the light!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
…No, don't be scared. I 
just hate soft stuff! Don't 
get the wrong idea!
